vi@v-os.ca

The example page covers all the rules of V-OS.

This page showcases all supported markup syntax in V-OS.

The markup language supports nesting and is based off of Markdown, but includes a few of its own custom rules.

=[tag] link list

Creates a list of artifacts that have this tag.

  • Aquaform - Water.
  • Archform Day - Shining strata.
  • Archform Night - Beaming highlights.
  • An ARK Simulation is a custom instance of a digital Paradise for a select body of Automata.
  • Atomic AI are artificial-intelligent beings in their state of infancy.
  • Big Mountain is a documentation of a visit to Banff.
  • Chroniqueur is an emergent narrative experimentation platform built by LabLabLab.
  • Log 9: End's Cibo.
  • Dpt is a collection of AR, VR, web, and interactive installation projects at studio Dpt.
  • An Early Midnight is the predecessor intrasuit to the Successor Series project.
  • Ethera's Word, the temporal trigger.
  • Fireform - Primitive mastery.
  • Fracas is a realtime point cloud music video with photogrammetric flowers.
  • Golden Bike is a documentation of a 360km bike trip across Japan.
  • i-tema is a morphologically minimal synthetic language.
  • Invictus is a collection of branding, publicity, and web projects for Invictus Gloves.
  • Iregular is a collection of interactive installation and projection-mapping projects for Iregular.
  • Jagged Orbit is a photogrammetry-based realtime particle system.
  • Kabam is a collection of game projects at game studio Kabam Montreal.
  • Loveletter To Japan is a collection of night photos from my final evenings in Tokyo.
  • Nakade is a realtime point-cloud audiovisual demo.
  • Natura - Loxiolid.
  • Navmos is a deck of Tarot-inspired cards.
  • Org_Proc is an organic synthesis model.
  • Papur, the cosmic station.
  • QU-6, m_struct #760.
  • Records of RADIATION.
  • Techform - Advanced refinement.
  • The Time Breaker is a sheathe capable of localized temporal distortion.
  • TIMESCAPE, a known future.
  • The Toriyomu are semi-organic vehicles used by the Early Midnights.
  • Yoshigira is a small album featuring a park surrounded by civilization.

-[tag] title list

Creates a list of artifacts' titles that have this tag.

  • Aquaform
  • Archform Day
  • Archform Night
  • ARK Simulation
  • Atomic AI
  • Big Mountain
  • Chroniqueur

- condensed
- list

Creates a custom condensed list of text items.

  • text1
  • text2

1. spacious
2. list

Creates a custom spacious list of text items.

  1. text1
  2. text2

> text indented quote

Creates indented quotation.

Quotation here.

`codeblock`

Creates an inline codeblock.

Text with code in it.

```
multiline
codeblock
```

Creates a multiline codeblock.

codeblock with multiple lines

%[code]

Executes JS code.

Result of '2 + 2', calculated with javascript: 4

# subtitle

Creates a subtitle.

Subtitle.

## small subtitle

Creates a small subtitle.

Small subtitle.

$ [artifact>attribute]

Takes an artifact's attribute and outputs it. In this case, we're referencing V-OS' title attribute.

$[index>title]

@[artifact]

Creates a link to an artifact.

Link to aquaform.

[text](link)

Creates a custom link to any given URL.

Custom link

&[artifact]

Creates a stylized link to an artifact.

Purity is an authoring engine that used to act as the backend of V-OS.

![alt text](directory/fileName.extension)

Creates a media element, supports images, videos, audio, and files. The root directory of these files must be defined in the bundler.

**bold**

Makes text bold.

Bold text.

*italic*

Makes text italic.

Italic text.

***italibold***

Makes text italic and bold.

Italic and bold text.

---

Creates custom styled divider, as seen numerous times in this page.
